issue.title: www.macrumors.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.macrumors.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.macrumors.com%2F) ### Comment > Hi. This is a new issue I haven't had until today with MacRumors. When I open the web, no images are shown. If I close Safari and open it again, the images remain lost. If I disable AdGuard, all the content from the web page returns. There must be something you or the MacRumors developers have changed that prevents the pics to be shown. Please, investigate it. Thank you. Best. Antonio ### Screenshots

issue.title: www.macrumors.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.macrumors.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.macrumors.com%2F) ### Comment > Hi. This is a new issue I haven't had until today with MacRumors. When I open the web, no images are shown. If I close Safari and open it again, the images remain lost. If I disable AdGuard, all the content from the web page returns. There must be something you or the MacRumors developers have changed that prevents the pics to be shown. Please, investigate it. Thank you. Best. Antonio ### Screenshots

issue.title: open.spotify.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://open.spotify.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopen.spotify.com%2F) ### Comment > Spotify player gets stuck on ads sometimes on web player with AdGuard enabled - no songs, nothing, not even ad plays. Only solution is to refresh the browser and replay the playlist. Trying to change playlist doesn't work either, completely stuck playerand now playing view. While with AdGuard disabled, ads load normally and player works as intended. One important thing: It happens after 2-3 times ads are skipped. e.g I open player, play a playlist, ads come normally due course, gets skipped twice or even thrice, songs playing uninterrupted, after that it gets stuck on ad and nothing plays. Like spotify detects adblocker is on after 2-3 skips and blocks plays (guess). ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/83mi74u948w0g4kgws88k0sg8g8k4sg9pssix2rkdg.png?nc=1)

issue.title: Google Play: free.vpnrussia.secure.unlimited.turbo.unblock.proxy

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=free.vpnrussia.secure.unlimited.turbo.unblock.proxy](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dfree.vpnrussia.secure.unlimited.turbo.unblock.proxy) ### Comment > Несколько лет пользовался днс "dns.adguard.com", всё было великолепно, в приложениях и играх из гугл плей не появлялась реклама вообще. А сегодня 5 декабря вдруг начала появляться реклама во всех приложениях, хотя днс работает, получается он хоть и активен но потерял свои возможности, в чем проблема и как это исправить? ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/cyxi24gebzwcoowc88000ssok44cwgwg2qzmzts2tk.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/agp3r3qfj4g880o0s88w8wgsckwggs02fwn2kasjrm.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/71ark8i5kzwo84ksc0w4gokskg484ww5pvbi7c2tfo.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS DNS setup: | Device or router settings DNS server: | Private AdGuard DNS server System version: | `Android ` Browser: | Chrome Blocklists: | General:
AdGuard DNS

comment.body:
> Странно. Может утечка DNS? Можно проверить с AdGuard для Android с включенной защитой DNS. Или новое наше приложение только для применения DNS https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.adguard.dnsclient

Увы, даже с этим приложением при входе видна реклама 

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/c40d741d-3e47-4196-a826-84ff98724bbd)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/341cf8b5-d276-4115-bd7f-ab817f16b7e6)

issue.title: www.macrumors.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.macrumors.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.macrumors.com%2F) ### Comment > Hi. This is a new issue I haven't had until today with MacRumors. When I open the web, no images are shown. If I close Safari and open it again, the images remain lost. If I disable AdGuard, all the content from the web page returns. There must be something you or the MacRumors developers have changed that prevents the pics to be shown. Please, investigate it. Thank you. Best. Antonio ### Screenshots
